p: ERA-Interim and ERA-20C data sets can be downloaded at http://apps.ecmwf.int/datasets/. The observed sea ice data can be downloaded at http://nsidc.org/data/G10010, http://nsidc.org/data/G02202/versions/2 and http://nsidc.org/data/nsidc-0116/versions/3. The CESM-LE model data can be downloaded at http://www.cesm.ucar.edu/projects/community-projects/LENS/data-sets.html and the CMIP5 data can be downloaded at http://cmip-pcmdi.llnl.gov/cmip5/data_portal.html.
